amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds to apply the report entitled "Life Cycle Greenhouse Gas Perspective on Exporting Liquified Natural Gas from the United States" in any public interest determination under the Natural Gas Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to apply the report entitled "Life Cycle Greenhouse Gas Perspective on Exporting Liquified Natural Gas from the United States" in any public interest determination under the Natural Gas Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 172 (Roll no. 208).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 172 (Roll no. 208).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Rothfus.
